scenes.background: Monica leans back in her chair, looking tired. Bob checks his watch frequently.
scenes.description: 'We can't keep going like this. Something's got to give. How are we going to handle this?'

options.text: We might need to reassess our priorities and focus on what's most urgent.
options.analysis: You suggested a constructive approach, showing good perception and social skills, though your motivation to help was lower.

options.text: I think we need to communicate better and delegate tasks more efficiently.
options.analysis: You focused on communication and delegation, showing strong self-regulation, but your empathy was lower.

options.text: It's frustrating, but we have to deal with it. Maybe we need to work harder.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, but your motivation was high.
